gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 118, Pelicans 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics outscored the Pelicans, 37-25, in the final frame to defeat New Orleans 118-112. Jayson Tatum led Boston with 28 points (14 in Q4), 10 rebounds, and eight assists) as Jaylen Brown totaled 22 points, 11 rebounds, and seven assists while Derrick White went 5-6 in the fourth quarter to score 13 of his 17 total points. Brandon Ingram led the Pelicans with 28 points, seven rebounds, and six assists as Zion Williamson added 26 points, four rebounds, and three assists. Boston improves to 36-11 as the Pelicans move to 26-21.
